name: ルカ
text:
今度あるよね
……シーズと、コメティックのライブ
trans:
It's coming up, right.
......The live with SHHis and CoMETIK.

name: 美琴
text: もちろん準備はしているけど
trans: Of course we're preparing for that too.

name: ルカ
text:
そうだよね
ごめん、違うんだ。言いたかったのは──
trans:
Of course you are. Sorry, that's not what I meant. 
What I wanted to say is──

name: ルカ
text:
────……一緒にやれるんだなって
ライブ
trans:
────......We'll get to do it together.
The live.

name: 千雪
text:
さて♪
ふたりとも、まずは手洗いとうがい、しちゃおう
trans:
Well now♪
You two should first go wash your hands and clean up a bit.

name: 愛依
text:
おっ、やろやろ～
この時期、そういうのちょー大事！
trans:
Ohh, we should～ It's suuuper important we keep ourselves
healthy during this time!

name: 果穂
text:
はい……！
風邪にもインフルエンザにもなれません……！
trans:
Yes......!
Let's not catch a cold or get the flu......!

name: 愛依
trans: Not to mention that we have a live coming up too～

name: ルカ
text:
美琴
プレゼント、どこに隠す──？
trans: Mikoto, where did you hide the presents──?

name: ルカ
text:
……や、それだと多分、入ってきた時
角度的に見える……！
trans:
......Bad idea. They'll probably spot it from the angle as
they enter the room......!

name: 美琴
text:
じゃあ…… 
こっちのパーテーションのうしろ
trans:
Then......
Let's put them behind the partition over here.

name: 果穂
text:
あっ、美琴さん、ルカさん！
お疲れ様です！

name: 千雪
text:
ごめんなさい
事務所の前で会ったんだけど、止められなくて……！
trans:
I'm sorry, I bumped into them at the door of the office but
couldn't stop them......!

name: 千雪
text:
夏葉ちゃんとプロデューサーさんも
車を戻したら来ると思う……！
trans:
Natsuha-chan and Producer-san will be coming after they
return the car.

name: 千雪
text:
果穂ちゃんと愛依ちゃんが事務所にいるつもりなら
場所を考える必要があるんだけど──
trans:
If Kaho-chan and Mei-chan were to stay in the office, then
we'll need to think of a space to do this──

name: 美琴
trans: What are the two of you doing in the office today?

name: 果穂
text: お金をもらいに来ました！
trans: I came to get back money!

name: 果穂
text:
みなさんは──
打ち合わせ……ですか？
trans: Are all of you here for... a meeting?

name: 美琴
trans: You can say it's something like that.

name: 果穂
text:
そうなんですね……！
もらったらすぐ出ます、じゃましません……っ！
trans:
I guessed as much......!
We'll go off right after we get the money, so we don't get
in the way......!

name: 千雪
text:
ごめんね……！
果穂ちゃん……
trans: I'm so sorry for the trouble......! Kaho-chan......

name: 愛依
text:
果穂ちゃんこっちこっち
プロデューサーのデスクの一番上の引き出し～
trans:
Come here, Kaho-chan. the paperwork's at the top drawer
of Producer's desk～

name: 愛依
text:
こないだのクリスマスプレゼント
ちゃんと渡せそう～？
trans:
Were you able to give out the Christmas presents we got
that day～?
